title: Sale & Clearance Clothing & Shoes

og.title: Sale & Clearance Clothing & Shoes  | Nordstrom
og.description: Free shipping and returns on all sale & clearance items at Nordstrom.com. Find great prices on top-brand clothing and more for women, men, kids and the home.
